name: Lonely Star
description:
A browser arcade space shooter flying game based on physics, where you use tactic to kill others, rather than guns.

You need to reach the moon, but your fuel is not infinite and luckily, you are in space and you can use space dust to fill up your fuel tank. 

And how do you do that ? Well, you crash into other people's space ships, making them fly into meteoroids. 

As your fuel level goes down, the overall scene stops being as attractive and you eventually you will end up playing an old-school 8-bit game.

Please feel free to leave feedback on the game in the comment section below.

----

Ruski
